body: Add an option to refresh card images. This is necessary because of the import option which does not refresh images so, for example, my JOU set of card images which were downloaded in an earlier version are all low res and are imported each time I update to a new version. But the images have since been updated to high-res on mtgimages.com but there is no way to get these without removing the existing images first, which triggers the download mechanism.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Add option to refresh card images.

comments.body:
Just published a batch of commits that revamp the downloads dialog. I have added a new option to download images for unimplemented cards which can run in parallel with the playable download. You will need just over 1.5GB free disk space for all the images. The proxy settings have been moved to the preferences dialog and thus can now be saved.

**Status:** Started

content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on July 28, 2014 01:45:13_

Add an option to refresh card images. This is necessary because of the import option which does not refresh images so, for example, my JOU set of card images which were downloaded in an earlier version are all low res and are imported each time I update to a new version. But the images have since been updated to high-res on mtgimages.com but there is no way to get these without removing the existing images first, which triggers the download mechanism.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=626_
